verb.description: Make a series of soft explosive sounds, typically when being heated or as a symptom of a fault.
Deposit (metal) on a surface by using fast ions to eject particles of it from a target.

noun.description: A series of soft explosive sounds, typically produced by an engine or by something heating or burning.
examples: the sputter of the motor died away

origin: Late 16th century (as a verb): from Dutch sputteren, of imitative origin.
